channel.title: Book on Granada On
channel.description: Recent content in Book on Granada On

item.title: Buy the book
item.description: Buy the book The book is for sale in all Amazon shops with a size that can be easily carried in your back pocket. And it’s cheaper than a dish of paella in one of the tourist traps in the city center, so it will save you money. Closer to home, in the UK

item.title: Buy the eBook
item.description: Buy the book Buy the ebook for your mobile phone or simply to save money and help the planet. It’s DRM-free and also has a free license, so feel free and happy to share. Closer to home, in the UK
